content:
Where is the best place to see if there is any interest in implementing some ideas to the language:

cpu flags:
Access the carry bit, zero bit, etc both for rotates, operations that overflow, etc.

expanding i#arch u#arch, (i8arch) type:
Add "expandable" types, for example ints (and floats?). Expands to the uarch, iarch size as long as it's at least specified size... (programmer can specify/test min size)

Smart inlining:
Add the ability to guide inlining... inline only in loops, inline only in marked "performance" sections of code

Thanks
https://internals.rust-lang.org/ would be one option. A topic in non-MCP t-lang would probably be fine too.
